name: Let's Become Rock Stars! Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【CONT】 You get +1 to the limit on the number of cards in your hand.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: "Bocchi-chan", Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 "Disgraceful History" or 《Music》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavor_text: I don't want to work. Too scary!

name: Affirmation for the Future, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Light Shone Upon Their Path" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock. If you put it into your stock, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Sentiments Towards Starry, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.
【ACT】 [Put 1 "Sentiments Towards Starry, Nijika Ijichi" from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 2 of your characters] Put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock.

name: Overlapping Sounds, Kessoku Band
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.

name: Nijika's Summer Vacation, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage.

name: Seaside Scenery, Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【CONT】 If there are no cards in your memory, this card gets -5000 power and -1 soul.

name: See You Tomorrow, Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards except that card from their waiting room to their deck, and shuffles their deck.

name: Collapse, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 6 or more climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may return all cards from your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Overly Hospitable Maid, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Ehehe~

name: Can't Tell You! Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【CXCOMBO】 effect of "Can't Tell You! Nijika Ijichi", draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.

【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] At the end of this card's attack, if "Beyond Their Budokan Performance" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: Look Into Their Eyes and Smile, Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them.

【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: H-Here you are.

name: Growth? Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: W-Working at a restaurant is advanced stuff! I can't believe I cleared that bar so soon!

name: The Way of a Connoisseur, Ryo Yamada
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Music》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Take in the sound. The sound!

name: World of Solitude, Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of your opponent's characters ×1000.

【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax with in its trigger icon in your climax area, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Bwah?!

name: Plea in a Sudden Turn of Events, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(3)] Flip over 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Choose 1 level X or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters among those cards.

name: Real Dream, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory."

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: So my real dream is to make a band popular enough for me and my sister.

name: Blunt Attitude, Ryo Yamada
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage.

【AUTO】 Encore [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Steeped White, Hitori Gotoh
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

"Choose up to 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock."

ability: 【AUTO】 When your opponent uses an 【ACT】, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Reflection, Ryo Yamada
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Affirmation for the Future, Nijika Ijichi", put it in the position that this card was in as 【REST】, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Music》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Urgent Member Recruitment, Nijika Ijichi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another character with "Nijika(虹夏)" in its card name, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 3 "Disgraceful History" or 《Music》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
